buildCommand: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting build...' && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Checking pnpm version...' && pnpm -v && echo 'ğŸ“‚ Current directory:' && pwd && ls -la package.json && echo 'ğŸ”¨ Running build...' && pnpm build
installCommand: echo 'ğŸ“¦ Setting up pnpm via corepack...' && corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.6.0 --activate && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing dependencies from monorepo root...' && cd ../.. && pnpm install
